Strops:RitualOfRitualPower.NAME: Ritual of Ritual
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yRitual at the end of each turn (after #yRitual is triggered).

Strops:FireTalentsPower.NAME: Fire Talents
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, deal #b%d damage, randomly split among all enemies.

Strops:FrozenPower.NAME: Frozen
DESCRIPTIONS: Does nothing until the creature receives HP loss.

Strops:RegisterPower.NAME: Register
DESCRIPTIONS: On death, the following cards will be returned to your hand:

Strops:SuspendedGoldPower.NAME: Suspended Treasure
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of #b%d turn(s) later, gain #b%d #yGold.
